paper_abstract: The goal of this project is to rapidly construct an order-by-order level snapshot of financial markets with nanosecond resolution time stamps. We are particularly interested in understanding the impact of high-frequency traders on the security, stability, and fairness of these markets. In this paper, we describe our computational approach, the optimizations that were applied to improve the performance of the software by a factor of more than 125x, and the new capabilities that can be enabled using a combination of fast algorithms and XSEDE resources. Copyright (c) 2014 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
paper_title: Fast construction of nanosecond level snapshots of financial markets
